title: Who we are
summary: We are Telefónica Investigación y Desarrollo and we license you to use the DeepSight mobile application software.

title: Overview
summary: The App is intended to develop a tool for visual attention tracking for portable devices like smartphones and tablets.

title: Data Gathering
summary: The App collects data about you through your use of the App or generated by us through analysis. Such examples include contact information (e.g., name, email), demographic data (e.g., gender, age), biometric data (e.g., head position/orientation, eyes position/orientation, jaw position/orientation).

title: Privacy
summary: We do not share any personal information about you with our customers or any other Data Controllers, except aggregated and anonymised information with certain service providers for specific activities.

title: Security
summary: As part of our commitment to ensure the security and confidentiality of your personal information, we apply the most reliable security measures to prevent loss, misuse or unauthorised access.

title: Time Commitment
summary: The duration of the study will be approximately 30 minutes (although the exact time can vary depending for example on the size of the mobile phone screen and how successful are the data recording sessions) and it will be conducted in English.

title: Study Tasks
summary: TODO: Add short description of app usage

title: Compensation
summary: After completing the tasks, you will be compensated with a valuable gift via your account in Prolific.
